snippet: While the NBA season has been dominated by the record-setting Golden State Warriors and Kobe Bryant's retirement tour, the San Antonio Spurs have quietly played in the background plotting to steal the final headlines....
lead_paragraph: While the NBA season has been dominated by the record-setting Golden State Warriors and Kobe Bryant's retirement tour, the San Antonio Spurs have quietly played in the background plotting to steal the final headlines.

headline.main: Perennial Contending Spurs Content Outside Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Perennial Contending Spurs Content Outside Spotlight
